= Bridged mode in the virtual machine =

== VMWare ==

In the right bottom corner of your VMWare player, right click the network icon to access the network properties for this VM:

https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-4tyKwL2QyFo/TrWRh9QMdOI/AAAAAAAAAmk/6ebLe_kRVvg/s172/vmware-bridged-1.png

In the network configuration dialog select the option "Bridged":

https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-4muMIbQCxos/TrWRiTxuktI/AAAAAAAAAmw/xJmHkDsOAjA/s576/vmware-bridged-2.png

== VirtualBox ==

In the right bottom corner of your VM player, right click the network icon to access the network properties for this VM:

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-7alItN6Eso0/TrWRh02KKwI/AAAAAAAAAmg/h7ncpCK4uuU/s282/vbox-bridged-1.png

In the network configuration dialog select the network adapter of your physical machine and the option "Bridged Adapter:

https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-IhmlmVnHUjI/TrWRic7az2I/AAAAAAAAAm0/A1cIDPWr-_Q/s576/vbox-bridged-2.png
